dialogue: Hello! Yes, you're back, finally. That was what it took? Really, all I had to do was that any you would make your choice, and what a choice it was. We wont ponder on the specifics, but, needless to say, I'm proud of you. We're all proud of you. I knew you just needed a bit of a warm up. Now, let's put this behind us and continue with the calibration questions, shall we?.
